text: wtra -ayha alrswl- hwla' alzaalimin yueradwn ealaa alnaar khadiein mtdhllyn yanzurun 'iilaa alnnar min trf dhlyl daeif min alkhawf walhwan. waqal aladhin amanuu biallah warasulih fi aljnt, lamaa eaynu ma hll balkfar min khsran: 'iina alkhasirin hqana hum aladhin khasiruu 'anfusahum wa'ahlihim yawm alqiamat bidukhul alnar. 'ala 'iina alzalmyn- yawm alqyamt- fi eadhab daym, la ynqte enhm, wala yzwl
